mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wxcms_img_resource (id, media_id, true_name, type, name, url, http_url, size, create_time, update_time, flag) VALUES(#{id}, #{mediaId}, #{trueName}, #{type}, #{name}, #{url}, #{httpUrl}, #{size}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{flag})
